column6:
The mighty Avengers meet Spider-Man! And the only blurb we can write is "WOWEE!" Also re-introducing the mysterious KANG! Yes, it's another classic spectacular story by Stan Lee with incomparable illustrations by Don Heck...plus an all-new masterpiece from the peerless minds of Tom Beland and Juan Doe!,2008,4
Rated A ...$2.99
column8: | penciller (cover):Art Adams | writer:Tom Beland | artist:Juan Doe | letterer:Rus Wooton
